tool_description: Sets up progress tracking frameworks for learning activities, defining milestones, assessment methods, and monitoring schedules for educational development.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to create progress tracking for

tracking_duration_weeks.description: Duration for progress tracking in weeks (1-52)

assessment_frequency.description: How often to assess progress: daily, weekly, biweekly, or monthly

focus_areas.description: Learning areas to focus tracking on: skills, knowledge, engagement, behavior

documentation_method.description: Method for documenting progress: observation, portfolio, checklist, or mixed

error_messages: Empty activity list: At least one activity ID must be provided.
Invalid duration: tracking_duration_weeks must be between 1 and 52 weeks.
Invalid frequency: assessment_frequency must be one of [daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly].
Invalid focus area: focus_areas must be from [skills, knowledge, engagement, behavior].
Invalid documentation method: Must be one of [observation, portfolio, checklist, mixed].
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
usage: Provide activity IDs and tracking duration to set up progress monitoring. Optionally specify assessment frequency, focus areas, and documentation methods for customized tracking.

tracking_framework.description: Overall framework structure for progress tracking

assessment_methods.description: Specific methods for assessing each activity's progress

documentation_tools.description: Tools and templates for documenting progress

success_indicators.description: Key indicators of successful learning for each activity
